1.content: Design and implement enhanced database schema for volunteer management
1.details: Create volunteer_opportunities, volunteer_signups, and enhanced volunteer_hours tables with proper relationships, RLS policies, and indexes

2.details: Opportunities browser, smart sign-up system, enhanced hour logging with opportunity linking, personal dashboard

3.details: Opportunity CRUD operations, capacity tracking, approval workflows, analytics dashboard

4.content: Implement business logic via Supabase Edge Functions
4.details: Capacity management, waiver calculations, hour approvals, notifications, analytics

5.content: Create enhanced UI/UX with green branding
5.details: Professional volunteer management interface matching site theme, responsive design, accessibility

6.content: Test and deploy enhanced volunteer portal
6.details: End-to-end testing, user acceptance testing, deployment with migration strategy
